Title: Prohibits the driving of motor vehicles or motorcycles in bicycle lanes and bicycle paths in N.Y. city
Summary: Prohibits the driving of motor vehicles or motorcycles in bicycle lanes and paths in a city with a population of one million or more; provides for a fine of $75; provides a conviction shall not be made part of the operating record of the person upon whom such liability is imposed and shall not be used for insurance purposes in the provision of motor vehicle insurance coverage.
LawCode: Add ยง1132, amd ยง1800, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to prohibiting the driving of motor vehicles or motorcycles in bicycle lanes or bicycle paths in a city with a population of one million or more
